thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: American Sentenced to 20 Years for Accepting Islamic State Money to Fund Terrorism

author: Maria Armental
title: American Sentenced to 20 Years for Accepting Islamic State Money to Fund Terrorism
text:
An American man whose arrest helped expose a global financial network used by Islamic State to move money around the world was sentenced Friday to 20 years in federal prison.
Mohamed Elshinawy—who last year pleaded guilty to four counts, including conspiring to provide material support to Islamic State—was also sentenced to 15 years of supervised release.
